skill.name: invoice-organizer
skill.description: Automatically organizes invoices and receipts for tax preparation by reading messy files, extracting key information, renaming them consistently, and sorting them into logical folders. Turns hours of manual bookkeeping into minutes of automated organization.
skill.summary: Automatically organizes invoices and receipts for tax preparation by reading messy files, extracting...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation. No executable code, scripts, or network calls. Uses only standard Claude Code file reading capabilities for invoice organization.

content.value_statement: Manually sorting invoices and receipts takes hours of tedious bookkeeping. This skill automatically reads your files, extracts key information like dates and vendors, renames everything consistently, and sorts documents into logical folders. Get tax-ready records in minutes.
actual_capabilities: Reads PDF invoices and image receipts to extract vendor names, dates, and amounts
Renames files to standardized format: YYYY-MM-DD Vendor - Invoice - Description.pdf
Organizes documents into folders by vendor, category, date period, or tax type
Creates CSV spreadsheets with all invoice details for accountants
Handles multiple file formats including PDF, JPG, PNG, and screenshots
Identifies duplicates and flags files with missing information for review
limitations: Cannot process password-protected or encrypted PDF files
Image recognition quality depends on document clarity and scan quality
Does not connect to accounting software APIs for automatic import
Requires user approval before moving or renaming files

use_cases.title: Tax preparation made simple
use_cases.description: Turn a messy downloads folder into organized, accountant-ready records in minutes instead of hours.

use_cases.title: Client document processing
use_cases.description: Quickly organize scattered invoices from multiple clients into consistent, standardized filing structures.

use_cases.title: Personal expense management
use_cases.description: Keep track of personal and business expenses by automatically categorizing receipts by type and date.

prompt_templates.title: Basic organization
prompt_templates.prompt: Organize these invoices. Read all files, rename them to YYYY-MM-DD Vendor - Invoice format, and organize by vendor.

prompt_templates.title: Tax preparation
prompt_templates.prompt: Prepare these invoices for tax season. Extract dates, amounts, and vendors. Sort into Deductible/ and Personal/ folders. Create a CSV summary.

prompt_templates.title: Monthly expenses
prompt_templates.prompt: Organize last month's receipts by category (Software, Office, Travel). Calculate totals per category and export to CSV.

prompt_templates.title: Archive cleanup
prompt_templates.prompt: I have five years of mixed invoices. Create a structure by Year/Category/Vendor. Rename all files consistently and flag any duplicates.

output_examples.input: Organize my invoices for tax preparation
output: Processed 47 invoices from January to December 2024
Organized into Invoices/2024/ folder with Software/, Office/, Travel/, and Services/ subfolders
Generated invoice-summary.csv with all 47 records including dates, vendors, amounts, and categories
2 files flagged for manual review due to unclear information

best_practices: Keep original files backed up before reorganization, especially for important tax documents
Use consistent naming and folder structures that match your accounting software requirements
Review the generated CSV summary before sharing with your accountant
anti_patterns: Do not use for sensitive financial documents without first verifying the extraction accuracy
Avoid processing documents with personal information in shared or public folders
Do not rely solely on automated extraction for audit-critical tax documents without manual verification

faq.question: What file formats does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with PDF invoices, scanned receipts (JPG, PNG), email attachments, screenshots, and bank statement exports.

faq.question: Can this skill process encrypted or password-protected PDFs?
faq.answer: No. Password-protected and encrypted PDFs cannot be read. You will need to provide unencrypted versions.

faq.question: Does this skill integrate directly with QuickBooks or Xero?
faq.answer: The skill creates CSV files compatible with most accounting software, but does not connect directly to APIs.

faq.question: Is my financial data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: The skill only reads files you specify and processes everything locally. No data is sent to external servers.

faq.question: What happens if the skill cannot read invoice information from a file?
faq.answer: Files with unclear information are flagged and moved to a Needs-Review folder for manual handling.

faq.question: How is this different from manual file organization?
faq.answer: The skill reads document content to extract actual dates, amounts, and vendors rather than relying on confusing filenames.
